bug.author: yuvallanger
bug.summary: Add link to the Doxygen documentation in the documentation.
bug.description:
I have linked to the Doxygen page from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yuvallanger/opencv/wiki/How_to_contribute>https://github.com/yuvallanger/opencv/wiki/How_to_contribute</denchmark-link> in this commit: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yuvallanger/opencv/wiki/How_to_contribute/a2cbf5bce93f51432dd1ef978fe5a89f2cf94e40>https://github.com/yuvallanger/opencv/wiki/How_to_contribute/a2cbf5bce93f51432dd1ef978fe5a89f2cf94e40</denchmark-link>
Please review the commit. I am not sure where to add the link.

comments.comment: Thank you! Wiki page has been updated.
